usefulItems: baking tray, barbecue grill rack, grill
title: Chilli Cheese Nachos

ingredients.content: 200 g beef mince, broken in pieces
15 g dark chocolate (50% cocoa), in small pieces or callets

preparations.content: Place onions, garlic and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>8 min/120°C//speed <b>.

Add chopped tomatoes, tomato purée, sugar, salt, cumin, oregano, bay leaf, turmeric, paprika, clove and cayenne pepper. Insert simmering basket and weigh in kidney beans, then cook <b>8 min/100°C//speed <b>. Remove simmering basket with aid of spatula and set aside.
Remove bay leaf. Add chocolate and stir <b>3 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add cooked kidney beans to mixing bowl and mix well with spatula.
Sprinkle tortilla chips over a baking tray, then pour chilli mixture over. Top with jalapeño chillies and grated cheese. Grill for 3-5 minutes (200°C) until cheese is melted. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with crème fraîche, guacamole and/or salsa.
